entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
